timeline.name: The Idea
timeline.description: The idea of an app for the STEAM Center was sent via email to the STEAM Ambassadors sponsor.

timeline.name: First Application
timeline.description: The first application form to develop an app for the STEAM Center was sent out to STEAM Ambassadors and Computer Science club.

timeline.name: First General Meeting
timeline.description: The first meeting was held through Zoom, all selected applicants meeting for the first time and laying the foundation for the STEAM Center App â€” then unnamed.

timeline.name: Begin Phase 1
timeline.description: Phase 1 of the STEAM Center App project began with our first meeting via Zoom.

timeline.name: Website Design
timeline.description: The process of designing and branding the STEAM Center App website started.

timeline.name: Admin Proposal
timeline.description: We held a presentation with Mr. Labue, the principal of the STEAM Center, and some administration members, introducing Phase 1 of our project.

timeline.name: End of Phase 1
timeline.description: The last meeting, via Zoom, of the school year hammering out all the details in preparation of Phase 2 next year.

timeline.name: Site Going Live
timeline.description: The STEAM Life Website went live!

timeline.name: Phase 2 Application
timeline.description: New member applications were sent out to students in STEAM Ambassadors and Computer Science Club, and a form was sent to check for returning members.

timeline.name: Begin Phase 2
timeline.description: Phase 2 began with our first meeting in the STEAM Center MPR.

timeline.name: UI Updates
timeline.description: Graphic design team completed initial UI updates to the website and created a mobile UI; the app development programming team started creating the STEAM Life mobile app.

timeline.name: STEAM Center Fall Festival
timeline.description: The STEAM Life team hosted a booth at the Fall Festival.

timeline.name: Logos
timeline.description: Official logos for STEAM Life were approved and decided upon.

timeline.name: Meeting With Admin
timeline.description: Another presentation was held about the viability of a STEAM Life App and our progress thus far.

timeline.name: Team Engagement
timeline.description: Reassessed team engagement with a continuing member and new member application, saw a loss in app development and marketing.

timeline.name: Refilling Positions
timeline.description: Introduced new marketing and app development programming members to the project to help with development.

timeline.name: Backend Confirmation
timeline.description: Solidified backend priorities for the programming teams.

timeline.name: Summer Tasks
timeline.description: Assigned summer tasks to each sub-team.

timeline.name: Ready to Release
timeline.description: Finalized web and mobile app for initial release, with backend features finished.

timeline.name: Begin Phase 3
timeline.description: Phase 3 began by meeting with our new development team in the STEAM Center MPR and first semester sub-team leaders were appointed.

timeline.name: Issue Tracker
timeline.description: An Issue Tracker was created to monitor bugs reported by web and mobile app user feedback.

timeline.name: Publishing Licenses
timeline.description: Licenses to publish to the Apple App Store and Google Play store were fully set up by administrators.

timeline.name: Bug Fixes
timeline.description: Received more user feedback from web and mobile app users and implemented fixes for any issues found.

timeline.name: District Approval
timeline.description: Met with the Head of District Communications for Allen ISD and received full approval for the release of our web and mobile applications.

timeline.name: Marketing Prep
timeline.description: Marketing prepared for our upcoming release by creating digital and physical content to promote STEAM Life.

timeline.name: Official Release
timeline.description: Released our web and mobile applications!
